implement.from sentence:
OpenNMT
We also implement the standard attentional seq2seq model with OpenNMT .

FTSum.from sentence: FTSum encoded the facts extracted from the source sentence to improve both the faithfulness and informativeness of generated summaries .

PIPELINE.from sentence:
In addition , to evaluate the effectiveness of our joint learning framework , we develop a baseline named " PIPELINE " .
However , it trains the Rerank module and Rewrite module in pipeline .
